subject: Sales
title: The Bandwagon Effect
description: Learn The Bandwagon Effect in one minute.

hook.text: A restaurant with a line outside draws more diners. The empty place next door stays empty.

buildup.text: The bandwagon effect means people follow the crowd. If others are buying, it must be worth it.

discovery.text: 'Ten thousand companies use us' persuades more than any feature list. Numbers signal social validation.

twist.text: The bandwagon has limits. When trends feel forced, contrarian buyers deliberately rebel against them.

climax.text: Use social proof wisely. Show the crowd but leave room for buyers to feel their choice is still personal.

punchline.text: Show the crowd. Most people will follow it.

quiz.question: What drives the bandwagon effect?
options: People follow the crowd because popularity signals value
